channel.title: r00t and looping
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "r00t and looping" - what, exactly, do we keep?

item.title: Re: r00t and looping
item.content:encoded:
Allies do not loop, but requirements to get allies loop (example: The ten hacks you did to get Trapchan loop so all you have to do is the quest) with the exception of Tsukasa 2. You have to pay the 5000 core each season you want her.

Twilight Guardian does not loop, but the passwords to get it do, so all you have to do is say the words at Hidden Forbidden Holy Ground each season you want it.

R00t rank does not loop. You have to defeat The One Sin as a Sanin each season you want it.

AFAIK everything else, including core, bits, keywords, elemental affinity, and all permanent items (including the password), loop.

item.title: Re: r00t and looping
item.content:encoded: 11 has said everything but the allies loop.

item.title: Re: r00t and looping
item.content:encoded: I haven't been able to check in a whileâ€¦ but I do believe bits and core do in fact loop with you.

item.title: r00t and looping
item.content:encoded: So. I've been grinding like a grinding fool, and hit my loop time a while ago. I know it's not like I *have* to loop like before, but it would be a good idea to do it soon. What I want to know is what do I keep from the r00t section. The loop quest says I keep my r00t password. What about my core and bits? I don't have enough to buy anything good (with the bits) but I don't want to risk losing what I've managed to accumulate. Has anyone gone through this and can let me know? ^_^;
